3. JavaScript (script.js)

This adds functionality to update balance and transactions.

js
let walletBalance = 5000;
let transactions = [];

function updateWalletDisplay() {
    document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
    let transactionList = document.getElementById("transactions");
    transactionList.innerHTML = "";
    transactions.forEach(transaction => {
        let li = document.createElement("li");
        li.innerText = transaction;
        transactionList.appendChild(li);
    });
}

function addMoney() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
        walletBalance += amount;
        transactions.push(`Added ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid amount");
    }
}

function makePayment() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
        walletBalance -= amount;
        transactions.push(`Paid ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
    }
}

updateWalletDisplay();

Features Implemented

  • ✅ Make Payment feature.

  • ✅ Transaction History tracking.

  • ✅ Responsive Design.

3. Corrected JavaScript (paytm.js)

js
let walletBalance = 5000;
let transactions = [];

function updateWalletDisplay() {
    document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
    let transactionList = document.getElementById("transactions");
    transactionList.innerHTML = "";
    transactions.forEach(transaction => {
        let li = document.createElement("li");
        li.innerText = transaction;
        transactionList.appendChild(li);
    });
}

function addMoney() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
        walletBalance += amount;
        transactions.push(`Added ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid amount");
    }
}

function makePayment() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
        walletBalance -= amount;
        transactions.push(`Paid ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
    }
}

updateWalletDisplay();

    background: #005bb5;

    margin-top: 20px;

    list-style-type: none;

5. JavaScript (paytm.js)

js
let walletBalance = 5000;
let transactions = [];

function updateWalletDisplay() {
    document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
    let transactionList = document.getElementById("transactions");
    transactionList.innerHTML = "";
    transactions.forEach(transaction => {
        let li = document.createElement("li");
        li.innerText = transaction;
        transactionList.appendChild(li);
    });
}

function addMoney() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
        walletBalance += amount;
        transactions.push(`Added ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid amount");
    }
}

function makePayment() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
        walletBalance -= amount;
        transactions.push(`Paid ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
    }
}

updateWalletDisplay();

🚀 Now your Paytm Clone has a Home Page and Wallet Page with a Sign In Avatar, Navbar, and Search Functionality! 🎯

                <img class="avatar" src="https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.NMMzLLjrbESLtFRM199LzQHaHa&pid=Api&P=0&w=300&h=300" alt="Avatar">
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Home Page -->
    <div id="home-container" class="container">
        <h1>Welcome to Paytm Clone</h1>
        <p>Manage your digital wallet, pay bills, and send money easily.</p>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showWallet()">Go to Wallet</button>
    </div>

    <!-- Wallet Page -->
    <div id="wallet-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
        <header>
            <h1>Paytm Wallet</h1>
        </header>
        <div class="wallet-section">
            <h2>Wallet Balance: ₹<span id="wallet-balance">5000</span></h2>
            <button onclick="addMoney()">Add Money</button>
            <button onclick="makePayment()">Make Payment</button>
            <button class="btn" onclick="showPayment()">Proceed to Payment</button>
        </div>
        <div class="transaction-history">
            <h2>Transaction History</h2>
            <ul id="transactions"></ul>
        </div>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showHome()">Back to Home</button>
    </div>

    <!-- Payment Wallet Page -->
    <div id="payment-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
        <header>
            <h1>Payment Wallet</h1>
        </header>
        <p>Pay for services, bills, and online purchases directly from your wallet.</p>
        <button class="btn" onclick="makePayment()">Pay Now</button>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showWallet()">Back to Wallet</button>
    </div>

    <script>
        let walletBalance = 5000;
        let transactions = [];

        function updateWalletDisplay() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
            let transactionList = document.getElementById("transactions");
            transactionList.innerHTML = "";
            transactions.forEach(transaction => {
                let li = document.createElement("li");
                li.innerText = transaction;
                transactionList.appendChild(li);
            });
        }

        function addMoney() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
                walletBalance += amount;
                transactions.push(`Added ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid amount");
            }
        }

        function makePayment() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
                walletBalance -= amount;
                transactions.push(`Paid ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
            }
        }

        function showWallet() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function showPayment() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        function showHome() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        updateWalletDisplay();
    </script>

</body>
</html>

✅ Wallet functions: Add Money, Make Payment, View Transactions
✅ Payment Wallet Page for paying bills and purchases
✅ Navbar with Paytm logo, search bar, and Sign In avatar
✅ Clean, responsive, and interactive UI

    <!-- Wallet Page -->
    <div id="wallet-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
        <header>
            <h1>Paytm Wallet</h1>
        </header>
        <div class="wallet-section">
            <h2>Wallet Balance: ₹<span id="wallet-balance">5000</span></h2>
            <button onclick="addMoney()">Add Money</button>
            <button onclick="makePayment()">Make Payment</button>
            <button class="btn" onclick="showPayment()">Proceed to Payment</button>
        </div>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showHome()">Back to Home</button>
    </div>

    <!-- Payment Wallet Page -->
    <div id="payment-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
        <header>
            <h1>Payment Wallet</h1>
        </header>
        <p>Pay for services, bills, and online purchases directly from your wallet.</p>
        <button class="btn" onclick="makePayment()">Pay Now</button>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showWallet()">Back to Wallet</button>
    </div>

    <script>
        let walletBalance = 5000;
        let transactions = [];

        function updateWalletDisplay() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
        }

        function addMoney() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
                walletBalance += amount;
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid amount");
            }
        }

        function makePayment() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
                walletBalance -= amount;
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
            }
        }

        function showWallet() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("login-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function showPayment() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        function showHome() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        function showLoginForm() {
            document.getElementById("login-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function hideLoginForm() {
            document.getElementById("login-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        function signIn() {
            let username = document.getElementById("username").value;
            if (username.trim() !== "") {
                localStorage.setItem("paytmUser", username);
                document.getElementById("accountBtn").innerText = `Logged in as ${username}`;
                hideLoginForm();
            } else {
                alert("Please enter a valid username");
            }
        }

        updateWalletDisplay();
    </script>

</body>
</html>

To add a scanner photo to your Paytm clone, you can place an image element (<img>) in the Wallet Page or the Payment Wallet Page, depending on where you want it to appear.

Here’s how you can do it:

📌 Steps to Add a Scanner Photo:

  1. Find a QR Scanner Image (Use an online QR scanner image, or upload your own).
    Example: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5e/QR_Code_example.png

  2. Place the Image in the Wallet Page under the wallet-section or payment-container.

  3. Style the Image to fit well.

📜 Updated Code with Scanner Photo:

html
<!-- Wallet Page with Scanner Photo -->
<div id="wallet-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
    <header>
        <h1>Paytm Wallet</h1>
    </header>
    <div class="wallet-section">
        <h2>Wallet Balance: ₹<span id="wallet-balance">5000</span></h2>
        <button onclick="addMoney()">Add Money</button>
        <button onclick="makePayment()">Make Payment</button>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showPayment()">Proceed to Payment</button>
        
        <!-- Scanner Image -->
        <h3>Scan to Pay</h3>
        <img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5e/QR_Code_example.png" alt="Scanner QR Code" class="scanner-img">
    </div>
    <button class="btn" onclick="showHome()">Back to Home</button>
</div>

<!-- Payment Wallet Page with Scanner -->
<div id="payment-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
    <header>
        <h1>Payment Wallet</h1>
    </header>
    <p>Pay for services, bills, and online purchases directly from your wallet.</p>

    <!-- Scanner Image -->
    <h3>Scan to Pay</h3>
    <img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5e/QR_Code_example.png" alt="Scanner QR Code" class="scanner-img">
    
    <button class="btn" onclick="makePayment()">Pay Now</button>
    <button class="btn" onclick="showWallet()">Back to Wallet</button>
</div>

css
.scanner-img {
    width: 150px; /* Adjust size */
    height: auto;
    margin: 20px 0;
    border: 2px solid #ddd;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

        function updateWalletDisplay() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
        }

        function addMoney() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
                walletBalance += amount;
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid amount");
            }
        }

        function makePayment() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
                walletBalance -= amount;
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
            }
        }

        function showWallet() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function showPayment() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "block";
        }

            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("payment-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

            alert("Login functionality coming soon!");
        }

        updateWalletDisplay();
    </script>

</body>

ChatGPT said:

To add a separate transaction history page, follow these steps:

📌 Steps:

  1. Create a New Page (history.html) for Viewing Transaction History.

  2. Modify the Wallet Page to include a "View Transaction History" button.

  3. Store Transactions in localStorage so they persist even after page refresh.

  4. Fetch and Display Transactions in the History Page.

📜 Step 1: Create history.html (Transaction History Page)

Create a new file history.html and add the following code:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Transaction History</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            background-color: #f5f5f5;
            text-align: center;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }
        
        .container {
            width: 80%;
            margin: auto;
            background: white;
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            margin-top: 50px;
        }

        .btn {
            background: #0078d7;
            color: white;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            font-size: 16px;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }

        .btn:hover {
            background: #005bb5;
        }

        .transaction-list {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .transaction-item {
            background: #ddd;
            margin: 5px;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 5px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <div class="container">
        <h1>Transaction History</h1>
        <ul id="transaction-history" class="transaction-list"></ul>
        <button class="btn" onclick="goBack()">Back to Wallet</button>
    </div>

    <script>
        function loadTransactions() {
            let transactions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactions")) || [];
            let historyList = document.getElementById("transaction-history");

            if (transactions.length === 0) {
                historyList.innerHTML = "<p>No transactions found.</p>";
            } else {
                transactions.forEach(transaction => {
                    let li = document.createElement("li");
                    li.className = "transaction-item";
                    li.innerText = transaction;
                    historyList.appendChild(li);
                });
            }
        }

        function goBack() {
            window.location.href = "index.html";  // Change to your wallet page filename
        }

        window.onload = loadTransactions;
    </script>

</body>
</html>

📜 Step 2: Modify Your index.html (Main File)

Add a button to open the transaction history inside the Wallet Page:

html
<button class="btn" onclick="viewTransactionHistory()">View Transaction History</button>

📌 Step 3: Update JavaScript in index.html

Modify the addMoney() and makePayment() functions to store transactions in localStorage.

html
<script>
    let walletBalance = 5000;
    let transactions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactions")) || [];

    function updateWalletDisplay() {
        document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
        localStorage.setItem("transactions", JSON.stringify(transactions));
    }

    function addMoney() {
        let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
        amount = parseInt(amount);
        if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
            walletBalance += amount;
            transactions.push(`Credited: ₹${amount}`);
            updateWalletDisplay();
        } else {
            alert("Invalid amount");
        }
    }

    function makePayment() {
        let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
        amount = parseInt(amount);
        if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
            walletBalance -= amount;
            transactions.push(`Debited: ₹${amount}`);
            updateWalletDisplay();
        } else {
            alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
        }
    }

    function viewTransactionHistory() {
        window.location.href = "history.html";
    }

    updateWalletDisplay();
</script>

📌 How This Works?

✅ Transaction History is Stored in localStorage so it persists after refresh.
✅ Transaction History Page Fetches and Displays Transactions Dynamically.
✅ Users Can See "Credited" and "Debited" Transactions.
✅ One-Click Navigation Between Wallet and History Page.

<!DOCTYPE html>

    <meta charset="UTF-8">

        .transaction-item {

            padding: 10px;

        }

</head>
<body>

    <!-- Navbar -->
    <div class="navbar">
        <div class="left">
            <img src="https://seeklogo.com/images/P/paytm-logo-092D33ED90-seeklogo.com.png" alt="Paytm Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <div class="middle">
            <input type="text" placeholder="Search Paytm..." class="search-bar">
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <div class="account" onclick="showLoginForm()" id="accountBtn">
                Sign In
                <img class="avatar" src="https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.NMMzLLjrbESLtFRM199LzQHaHa&pid=Api&P=0&w=300&h=300" alt="Avatar">
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Home Page -->
    <div id="home-container" class="container">
        <h1>Welcome to Paytm Clone</h1>
        <p>Manage your digital wallet, pay bills, and send money easily.</p>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showWallet()">Go to Wallet</button>
    </div>

    <!-- Wallet Page -->
    <div id="wallet-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
        <header>
            <h1>Paytm Wallet</h1>
        </header>
        <div class="wallet-section">
            <h2>Wallet Balance: ₹<span id="wallet-balance">5000</span></h2>
            <button class="btn" onclick="addMoney()">Add Money</button>
            <button class="btn" onclick="makePayment()">Make Payment</button>
            <button class="btn" onclick="showPayment()">Proceed to Payment</button>
            <button class="btn" onclick="showTransactionHistory()">View Transaction History</button>
        </div>

        <!-- Back to Home Button -->
        <button class="btn" onclick="showHome()">Back to Home</button>

        <!-- Scanner Image -->
        <div class="scanner-container">
            <h3>Scan to Pay</h3>
            <img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5e/QR_Code_example.png" 
                 alt="Scanner QR Code" class="scanner-img">
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Transaction History Page -->
    <div id="transaction-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
        <h1>Transaction History</h1>
        <ul id="transaction-history" class="transaction-list"></ul>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showWallet()">Back to Wallet</button>
    </div>

    <script>
        let walletBalance = 5000;
        let transactions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactions")) || [];

        function updateWalletDisplay() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
            localStorage.setItem("transactions", JSON.stringify(transactions));
        }

        function addMoney() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
                walletBalance += amount;
                transactions.push(`Credited: ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid amount");
            }
        }

        function makePayment() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
                walletBalance -= amount;
                transactions.push(`Debited: ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
            }
        }

        function showTransactionHistory() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "block";

            let historyList = document.getElementById("transaction-history");
            historyList.innerHTML = "";
            if (transactions.length === 0) {
                historyList.innerHTML = "<p>No transactions found.</p>";
            } else {
                transactions.forEach(transaction => {
                    let li = document.createElement("li");
                    li.className = "transaction-item";
                    li.innerText = transaction;
                    historyList.appendChild(li);
                });
            }
        }

        function showWallet() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function showHome() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        function showLoginForm() {
            alert("Login functionality coming soon!");
        }

        updateWalletDisplay();
    </script>

</body>
</html>

✅ Single HTML File for Everything (Home, Wallet, Transaction History).
✅ "View Transaction History" Button in Wallet Page.
✅ Transactions (Credit/Debit) Stored in localStorage.
✅ History Page Shows Full Transaction List.
✅ One-Click Navigation Between Pages.

        </header>

            <button class="btn" onclick="addMoney()">Add Money</button>
            <button class="btn" onclick="makePayment()">Make Payment</button>
            <button class="btn" onclick="showTransactionHistory()">View Transaction History</button>
        </div>

        <button class="btn" onclick="showHome()">Back to Home</button>

        <div class="scanner-container">
            <h3>Scan to Pay</h3>
            <img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5e/QR_Code_example.png" 
                 alt="Scanner QR Code" class="scanner-img">
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Transaction History Page -->
    <div id="transaction-container" class="container" style="display: none;">
        <h1>Transaction History</h1>
        <ul id="transaction-history" class="transaction-list"></ul>
        <button class="btn" onclick="showWallet()">Back to Wallet</button>
    </div>

    <script>
        let walletBalance = 5000;
        let transactions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactions")) || [];

        function updateWalletDisplay() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
            localStorage.setItem("transactions", JSON.stringify(transactions));
        }

        function addMoney() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
                walletBalance += amount;
                transactions.push(`Credited: ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid amount");
            }
        }

        function makePayment() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
                walletBalance -= amount;
                transactions.push(`Debited: ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
            }
        }

        function showTransactionHistory() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "block";

            let historyList = document.getElementById("transaction-history");
            historyList.innerHTML = "";
            if (transactions.length === 0) {
                historyList.innerHTML = "<p>No transactions found.</p>";
            } else {
                transactions.forEach(transaction => {
                    let li = document.createElement("li");
                    li.className = "transaction-item";
                    li.innerText = transaction;
                    historyList.appendChild(li);
                });
            }
        }

        function showWallet() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function showHome() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        function showLoginForm() {
            document.getElementById("login-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        function hideLoginForm() {
            document.getElementById("login-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        updateWalletDisplay();
    </script>

</body>
</html>

        function signIn() {

            if (username) {
                localStorage.setItem("username", username);
                window.location.href = "paytm.html"; // Redirect to Paytm clone page
            } else {
                alert("Please enter your name");
            }
        }
    </script>

    <script>
        let walletBalance = 5000;
        let transactions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactions")) || [];
        document.getElementById("user-name").innerText = localStorage.getItem("username") || "User";

        function updateWalletDisplay() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
            localStorage.setItem("transactions", JSON.stringify(transactions));
        }

        function addMoney() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
                walletBalance += amount;
                transactions.push(`Credited: ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid amount");
            }
        }

        function makePayment() {
            let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
            amount = parseInt(amount);
            if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
                walletBalance -= amount;
                transactions.push(`Debited: ₹${amount}`);
                updateWalletDisplay();
            } else {
                alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
            }
        }

        function showTransactionHistory() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "block";
            let historyList = document.getElementById("transaction-history");
            historyList.innerHTML = transactions.length ? transactions.map(t => `<li class="transaction-item">${t}</li>`).join("") : "<p>No transactions found.</p>";
        }

        function showWallet() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function showHome() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        updateWalletDisplay();
    </script>

</body>
</html>

4️⃣ script.js - JavaScript for Functionality

Handles wallet transactions, sign-in, and logout.

js
let walletBalance = 5000;
let transactions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactions")) || [];

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    if (document.getElementById("user-name")) {
        document.getElementById("user-name").innerText = localStorage.getItem("username") || "User";
    }
    updateWalletDisplay();
});

function signIn() {
    const username = document.getElementById("username").value;
    if (username) {
        localStorage.setItem("username", username);
        window.location.href = "paytm.html"; // Redirect to Paytm wallet page
    } else {
        alert("Please enter your name");
    }
}

function logout() {
    localStorage.removeItem("username");
    window.location.href = "index.html"; // Redirect to sign-in page
}

function updateWalletDisplay() {
    if (document.getElementById("wallet-balance")) {
        document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
    }
    localStorage.setItem("transactions", JSON.stringify(transactions));
}

function addMoney() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
        walletBalance += amount;
        transactions.push(`Credited: ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid amount");
    }
}

function makePayment() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
        walletBalance -= amount;
        transactions.push(`Debited: ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
    }
}

function showTransactionHistory() {
    document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "block";
    let historyList = document.getElementById("transaction-history");
    historyList.innerHTML = transactions.length ? transactions.map(t => `<li class="transaction-item">${t}</li>`).join("") : "<p>No transactions found.</p>";
}

function showWallet() {
    document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
    document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
}

function showHome() {
    document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
}

Now, index.html handles user login, and paytm.html serves as the main wallet interface. 🚀

4️⃣ script.js - JavaScript for Functionality

Handles wallet transactions, sign-in, and logout.

js
let walletBalance = 5000;
let transactions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactions")) || [];

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    if (document.getElementById("user-name")) {
        document.getElementById("user-name").innerText = localStorage.getItem("username") || "User";
    }
    updateWalletDisplay();
});

function signIn() {
    const username = document.getElementById("username").value;
    if (username) {
        localStorage.setItem("username", username);
        window.location.href = "home.html"; // Redirect to Home Page
    } else {
        alert("Please enter your name");
    }
}

function logout() {
    localStorage.removeItem("username");
    window.location.href = "index.html"; // Redirect to sign-in page
}

function updateWalletDisplay() {
    if (document.getElementById("wallet-balance")) {
        document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
    }
    localStorage.setItem("transactions", JSON.stringify(transactions));
}

function addMoney() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to add:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0) {
        walletBalance += amount;
        transactions.push(`Credited: ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid amount");
    }
}

function makePayment() {
    let amount = prompt("Enter amount to pay:");
    amount = parseInt(amount);
    if (!isNaN(amount) && amount > 0 && amount <= walletBalance) {
        walletBalance -= amount;
        transactions.push(`Debited: ₹${amount}`);
        updateWalletDisplay();
    } else {
        alert("Invalid or insufficient funds");
    }
}

function showTransactionHistory() {
    document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "block";
    let historyList = document.getElementById("transaction-history");
    historyList.innerHTML = transactions.length ? transactions.map(t => `<li class="transaction-item">${t}</li>`).join("") : "<p>No transactions found.</p>";
}

function showWallet() {
    document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "block";
    document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
}

function showHome() {
    document.getElementById("wallet-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
    document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
}

        function logout() {
            localStorage.removeItem("username");
            window.location.href = "index.html"; // Redirect to Sign-in Page
        }

        function updateWalletDisplay() {
            document.getElementById("wallet-balance").innerText = walletBalance;
            localStorage.setItem("transactions", JSON.stringify(transactions));
        }

        function transferToMobile() {
            document.getElementById("transfer-title").innerText = "Send Money to Mobile";
            document.getElementById("transfer-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function transferToBank() {
            document.getElementById("transfer-title").innerText = "Transfer to Bank Account";
            document.getElementById("transfer-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function selfTransfer() {
            document.getElementById("transfer-title").innerText = "Transfer to Self Account";
            document.getElementById("transfer-container").style.display = "block";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
        }

        function processTransfer() {
            let recipient = document.getElementById("recipient").value;
            let amount = parseInt(document.getElementById("transfer-amount").value);

            if (!recipient || isNaN(amount) || amount <= 0 || amount > walletBalance) {
                alert("Invalid transaction details or insufficient balance.");
                return;
            }

            walletBalance -= amount;
            transactions.push(`Sent ₹${amount} to ${recipient}`);
            updateWalletDisplay();
            showHome();
        }

        function showTransactionHistory() {
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "block";

            let historyList = document.getElementById("transaction-history");
            historyList.innerHTML = transactions.length ? transactions.map(t => `<li class="transaction-item">${t}</li>`).join("") : "<p>No transactions found.</p>";
        }

        function showHome() {
            document.getElementById("transfer-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("transaction-container").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("home-container").style.display = "block";
        }

        updateWalletDisplay();
    </script>

</body>
</html>

1️⃣ User logs in → Wallet Balance displayed.
2️⃣ User selects transfer option (Mobile, Bank, or Self).
3️⃣ User enters recipient details & amount → Confirms transaction.
4️⃣ Transaction updates the wallet balance & history.
5️⃣ User can view transaction history anytime.

This now fully mimics PhonePe's basic money transfer features. 🚀💸
